statements: SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT media_type, media_title FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, media_title FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE media_type = 'Movie';
SELECT user_id, media_type, media_title, timestamp FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT media_type FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns
SELECT user_id, media_title FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE media_type = 'Movie'
SELECT user_id, media_type, media_title FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, media_title FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE media_type = 'TV Show' ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns;
SELECT user_id, media_type, watch_duration FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE watch_duration > 100;
SELECT media_type, watch_duration FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, media_type, watch_duration, timestamp FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE user_id = '65e90210-eb24-4bc7-985a-75d57f301471';
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM MediaGenres;
SELECT user_id, media_type, watch_duration FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE watch_duration > 100 ORDER BY media_type DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT media_type, timestamp FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE media_type LIKE 'movie%' AND watch_duration BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, media_type, watch_duration, timestamp FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_views FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_views DESC;

SELECT user_id, media_type, watch_duration FROM MediaConsumptionPatterns JOIN MediaGenres ON MediaConsumptionPatterns.media_type = MediaGenres.genre_name WHERE MediaGenres.genre_name = 'Thriller' ORDER BY watch_duration ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM media_consumption ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, media_type, duration_minutes FROM media_consumption WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT user_id, media_type, rating FROM media_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, media_type, duration_minutes FROM media_consumption WHERE time_stamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age >= 18 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, media_type, rating FROM media_consumption mc JOIN media_ratings mr ON mc.user_id = mr.user_id AND mc.media_type = mr.media_type WHERE mr.rating > 4.5;
SELECT user_id, media_type, time_stamp FROM media_consumption WHERE media_type IN ('Movie', 'TV Show') AND duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumers
SELECT consumer_name, age, gender FROM MediaConsumers WHERE age > 30
SELECT channel_name, category, audience_size FROM MediaChannels ORDER BY audience_size DESC
SELECT * FROM ConsumptionLogs WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT consumer_name, age_group, income_level FROM MediaConsumers LEFT JOIN ViewerDemographics ON MediaConsumers.consumer_id = ViewerDemographics.consumer_id
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT consumer_name, age, location FROM MediaConsumers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT channel_name, category, audience_size FROM MediaChannels WHERE category = 'News' AND audience_size > 1000000;
SELECT channel_name, category, audience_size FROM MediaChannels ORDER BY audience_size DESC;

SELECT m.consumer_name, v.age_group, v.income_level, c.channel_name FROM MediaConsumers m JOIN ViewerDemographics v ON m.consumer_id = v.consumer_id JOIN ConsumptionLogs cl ON m.consumer_id = cl.consumer_id JOIN MediaChannels c ON cl.channel_id = c.channel_id WHERE v.age_group = '18-24' AND cl.view_duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY cl.view_duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT media_id, title, category FROM media_content WHERE duration > 120;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT user_id, media_id, view_date FROM media_views ORDER BY view_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY username;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(media_id) AS total_views FROM media_views GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_views > 10 ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT user_id, media_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5 AND rating_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT title, category, release_date FROM media_content WHERE category IN ('Action', 'Comedy') ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 10;
